name: Lust Highly Pigmented Lip Gloss
description:
gorgeous tube with LED applicator and mirror

Each highly pigmented shade of Lip Gloss combines rich color with the sensual shine of a minty-fresh gloss. The unique texture prevents the color from bleeding and makes it versatile enough to be worn alone or over other lip products. Lip Glisten will glide on with ease, leaving your lips feeling soft, supple, and sexy all day long.

Ingredients & Directions

Dab a touch of gloss in the middle of your bottom lip then rub your lips together for more of a sheen look.
Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Paraffin Oil, Polyethylene, Aroma, Metha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tin Oxide, [+/- (May Contain): Mica (CI 77019), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Orange 5 Lake CI (45370), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 21 Lake (CI 45380), Red 22 Lake (CI 45380), Red 27 Lake (CI 45410), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Red 36 (CI 12085), Red 40 Lake (CI 16035), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Yellow 10 Lake (CI 47005)].

Who Should Use Lip Glisten

Everyone looking for that fresh pop to their outfit!

name: Worth It Lip Plumper - Adore Me

breadcrumbs.name: Worth It Lip Plumper - Adore Me

images: https://beautysociety.blob.core.windows.net/images-prod/61603 Beauty Society Advisor Product Guide - Worth It.jpg
description:
ANTI-AGING LIP PLUMPER

NEW COLOR ALERT!!!

ADORE ME - Warm, spicey rose color.

These days big, full, and supple lips have never been sought after more! Women of all ages are going to extremes to get a full and pouty lip look, including expensive injection procedures. We are more than excited to have developed a true breakthrough in lip plumping. Our new plumping gloss will give you immediate and long-term results of pretty, full, and youthful lips.

Our state-of-the-art formula includes ingredients that will make your lips fuller within minutes and keeps them feeling good with added calming and cooling properties. We have also added anti-aging ingredients that will hydrate your lips, including Advanced BTX, which is clinically proven to increase your lips’ volume. This product is a complete game-changer. There is nothing like it, and you are the first in the world to experience the power of this breakthrough beauty product

*Due to rising costs, this product has undergone a slight price increase

Ingredients & Directions

Use Worth It multiple times a day to achieve a safe, plumper lip!

It has an incredible cinnamon flavor that is totally Worth It
Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Paraffin Oil, Polyethylene, Aroma, Metha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tin Oxide, [+/- (May Contain): Mica (CI 77019), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Orange 5 Lake CI (45370), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 21 Lake (CI 45380), Red 22 Lake (CI 45380), Red 27 Lake (CI 45410), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Red 36 (CI 12085), Red 40 Lake (CI 16035), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Yellow 10 Lake (CI 47005)].

Who Should Use Worth It

Anyone looking for big plump lips without invasive injections

***Please do not use if you are allergic or have a sensitivity to cinnamon

Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Cinnamomum Zeylanicum Leaf Oil, Menthyl Lactate, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Perfluorohexane, Perfluoroperhydrophenanthrene, Perfluorodecalin, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Ascorbic Acid, Citric Acid, PEG-8. May Contain [+/-]: Mica (CI 77019), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Manganese Violet (CI 77742, Red 28 (CI 45410), Blue 1 (CI 42090), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Red 7 (CI 15850), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 21 (CI 45380), Red 30 (CI 73360).

name: Pinkaboo Matte Liquid Lipstick
description:
gorgeous tube with LED applicator and mirror
Pinkaboo is our lightest Lip Nirvana shade consisting of a velvety smooth, bright peachy nude.

Lip Nirvana matte lipsticks are smudge-free and long-lasting. The unique texture prevents color from bleeding and makes it versatile enough to be worn alone or combined with Lip Glisten colors. Lip Nirvana will glide on with ease, leaving your lips feeling soft, supple, and sexy all day long. Combined with an LED applicator and mirror, Lip Nirvana is the ultimate cosmetic accessory.

4.5 ml

Ingredients & Directions

Gorgeous Matte Lipstick with a built-in Light and Mirror!

Isododecane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Synthetic Beeswax, VP/Eicosene Copolymer, Barium Sulfate, Polyethylene, Octyldocecanol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Flavor, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, May Contain [+/-]: Mica (CI 77019), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Red 28 (CI 45410), Blue 1 (CI 42090), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Red 7 (CI 15850), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 21 (CI 45380), Red 30 (CI 73360).

name: Poser Highly Pigmented Lip Gloss
description:
gorgeous tube with LED applicator and mirror

Each highly pigmented shade of Lip Gloss combines the rich color of a lipstick with the sensual shine of a minty-fresh gloss (all without the waxy or sticky feel usually associated with their counterparts). The unique texture prevents color from bleeding and makes it versatile enough to be worn alone or over other lip products. Lip Glisten will glide on with ease, leaving your lips feeling soft, supple, and sexy all day long.

Ingredients & Directions

Dab a touch of gloss in the middle of your bottom lip then rub your lips together for more of a sheen look.

Conversely swipe the glisten across your lips like lipstick for a fuller more vibrant coverage.
Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Paraffin Oil, Polyethylene, Aroma, Metha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tin Oxide, [+/- (May Contain): Mica (CI 77019), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Orange 5 Lake CI (45370), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 21 Lake (CI 45380), Red 22 Lake (CI 45380), Red 27 Lake (CI 45410), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Red 36 (CI 12085), Red 40 Lake (CI 16035), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Yellow 10 Lake (CI 47005)].

Who Should Use Lip Glisten

Everyone looking for that fresh pop to their outfit!

name: Lip Job Sugar Lip Scrub - Watermelon

breadcrumbs.name: Lip Job Sugar Lip Scrub - Watermelon

description:
Rub it on, lick it off! Lip Job scrubs are not only delicious but are excellent lip exfoliators.

Here's to a lip job you'll surely never regret!

Sugar Lip Scrub, Watermelon Flavor

10ml

Ingredients & Directions

Scoop a small amount out of the jar and massage the moisturizing sugar scrub over the lips. Lick clean for yummy results!

Sucrose, Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil, Sunflower Seed Oil, Castor Seed Oil, Safflower Seed Oil, Olive Fruit Oil, Paraffin, Synthetic Beeswax, Shea Butter, Cocoa Seed Butter, Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Avocado Oil, Rosa Canina Seed Extract, Jojoba Seed Oil, BHT, Grape Seed Oil, Microcrystalline Wax, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Flavor/Fragrance.

Who Should Use Lip Job

Great for those who want juicy fresh lips that look as good as they taste.

name: Crush - Lip + Cheek Tint
description:
Lip + Cheek Tint

We are so excited that you are one of the first to ever try our new lip and cheek tint! We love an all-natural look of beauty and this new crush of yours is soon to become part of your daily routine. Swipe it onto your lips and rub them together to put the perfect amount of natural looking color onto your kisser. Dot it a few times onto the apple of your cheeks and blend in right away with your fingertips for a perfectly blushing appearance.

0.50 fl. oz

Ingredients & Directions

Use Crush Lip + Cheek Tint to give yourself a gorgeous blushed look!

Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polysorbate 20, Disodium ETA, Natural Flavor.

Who Should Use Crush

All skin types.

name: Worth It Lip Plumper - Vault
images: https://beautysociety.blob.core.windows.net/images-prod/61603 Beauty Society Advisor Product Guide - Worth It.jpg
description:
ANTI-AGING LIP PLUMPER

NEW COLOR ALERT!!!

VAULT - The perfect rosey nude. Looks amazing on every skin tone!

These days big, full, and supple lips have never been sought after more! Women of all ages are going to extremes to get a full and pouty lip look, including expensive injection procedures. We are more than excited to have developed a true breakthrough in lip plumping. Our new plumping gloss will give you immediate and long-term results of pretty, full, and youthful lips.

Our state-of-the-art formula includes ingredients that will make your lips fuller within minutes and keeps them feeling good with added calming and cooling properties. We have also added anti-aging ingredients that will hydrate your lips, including Advanced BTX, which is clinically proven to increase your lips’ volume. This product is a complete game-changer. There is nothing like it, and you are the first in the world to experience the power of this breakthrough beauty product

*Due to rising costs, this product has undergone a slight price increase

Ingredients & Directions

Use Worth It multiple times a day to achieve a safe, plumper lip!

It has an incredible cinnamon flavor that is totally Worth It
Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Paraffin Oil, Polyethylene, Aroma, Metha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tin Oxide, [+/- (May Contain): Mica (CI 77019), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Orange 5 Lake CI (45370), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 21 Lake (CI 45380), Red 22 Lake (CI 45380), Red 27 Lake (CI 45410), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Red 36 (CI 12085), Red 40 Lake (CI 16035), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Yellow 10 Lake (CI 47005)].

Who Should Use Worth It

Anyone looking for big plump lips without invasive injections

***Please do not use if you are allergic or have a sensitivity to cinnamon

name: Night Shift - Nighttime Repair Lip Mask

breadcrumbs.name: Night Shift - Nighttime Repair Lip Mask

description:
Night Shift is an ultra-hydrating overnight mask designed to repair and rejuvenate lips for a fresh, plump look. Moisturizers such as shea butter, jojoba oil, and carnauba wax provide long-lasting hydration for softer lips. Advanced BTX and Swiss Apple stem cell compounds revitalize lips, reducing the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and other signs of aging. This refreshing mask can also be used around the mouth to combat fine lines. Night Shift is an ideal repair product for individuals who live in dry environments or who want to combat age-related changes to the lips.

description:
gorgeous tube with LED applicator and mirror

Each highly pigmented shade of Lip Gloss combines rich color with the sensual shine of a minty-fresh gloss. The unique texture prevents the color from bleeding and makes it versatile enough to be worn alone or over other lip products. Lip Glisten will glide on with ease, leaving your lips feeling soft, supple, and sexy all day long.

name: Worth It Lip Plumper
images: https://beautysociety.blob.core.windows.net/images-prod/61603 Beauty Society Advisor Product Guide - Worth It.jpg
description:
These days big, full, and supple lips have never been sought after more! Women of all ages are going to extremes to get a full and pouty lip look, including expensive injection procedures. We are more than excited to have developed a true breakthrough in lip plumping. Our new plumping gloss will give you immediate and long-term results of pretty, full, and youthful lips.

Our state-of the-art formula includes ingredients that will make your lips fuller within minutes and keeps them feeling good with added calming and cooling properties. We have also added anti-aging ingredients that will hydrate your lips, including Advanced BTX, which is clinically proven to increase your lips’ volume. This product is a complete game-changer. There is nothing like it, and you are the first in the world to experience the power of this breakthrough beauty product

*Due to rising costs, this product has undergone a slight price increase
